entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Grid ColV isn't constrained to row #15121
  • Rotating an image with an animation results in a wobble #15116
  • ColumnSpacing docs incorrect #15115
  • UITests TODOS #15113
    .NET 8
  • CollectionView: IsVisible - expand selected rows fails on iOS #15112
  • ShouldShowToolbarButton() override on FlyoutPage not working #15111
  • ResourceDictionary.ContainsKey method is not working correctly #15110
  • ITransform perspective rotation inconsistent on different platforms. #15108
  • Add ImageSpan for FormattedString in Label #15107
  • [Windows] Combination of Frame and Grid with too big content (Text or Path) will cause Xaml.UnhandledException #15106
    Backlog
  • Star columns not computed correctly when ScrollView spans across all of them #15105
  • Failed to AOT compile while building iOS IPA and using Microsoft.Maui.Essentials NuGet package in a class library #15104
  • iOS issue tabbar having 6 tabs, On the 6th tab, button click having Shell.Current.GoToAsync to show new page, not working #15103
  • NavHost cannot be null on Back key pressed #15102
    Backlog
  • Visual Studio 2022 not installing MAUI properly, cannot find MAUI workload, project unloaded #15100

Closed

  • SwipeGestureRecognizer is not working #7403
  • Unconstrained * rows/columns in Grid may expand when they should not #14694
  • [regression/8.0.0-preview.3.8149] Regression in grid layouts in .NET 8 #14818
    .NET 8
  • MAUI Navigation Stack null item bug #15101
  • Grid row not sizing correctly with * when the content is a collectionview on iOS #15092
  • [Android] [Scenario Day] CarouselView freeze trying to use Spacing #7253
    .NET 8 Planning
  • [Android] ListView with ItemsSource ObservableCollection crashes on item removal #7311
  • CollectionView Crash when clearing & adding data second time. #7343
    Backlog
  • ListView item size differences Windows/Android #7312
  • Databinding FontImageSource.Glyph doesn't update #7383
    Backlog
  • Changing the theme has no effect on some controls (only in release) #11510
    Backlog
  • [Shapes] Path render wrong position #7700

PullRequests

Created

  • Add full list of MAUI versions to bug-report issue template #15120
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, community ✨
  • Tests and fixes to verify that spanned views are including spacing in measurements #15119
    area/layout 🔲
  • Android gallery fixes #15118
  • [workload] add metadata about .NET 6 EOL #15117
    area/setup 🪄
  • Fix contentview rtl #15114
    area/layout 🔲
  • Ensure "text boxes" preserve cursor location #15099
    area/controls 🎮, control-entry

Merged

  • [uitests] Work for get appium uitests with CI #14488
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Handle Grid * expansion when size is larger than minimum, but less than sufficient to display full size #14902
    area/layout 🔲, layout-grid
  • Fix up Compatibility gallery #15020
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Bump Microsoft.Web.WebView2 from 1.0.1722.45 to 1.0.1774.30 #14994
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget

Updated

  • [ios] fix memory leak in Image #15062
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/perf 🏎️
  • Make CollectionView on iOS measure to content size #14951
    area/collectionview 📃
  • Add visual testing support, on top of Appium #14999
    area/testing
  • Remove incorrect call to `DisconnectHandler` #15036
  • [Windows] fixing window glitches while moving or resizing #14861
    platform/windows 🪟, area/desktop 🖥️, community ✨
  • Bump Xamarin.Android.Glide from 4.14.2.1 to 4.15.1 #15089
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Style specificity #13818
    area/Xaml </>
  • Android: fix dialog button colors in dark mode #15091
    platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-dialogalert
  • Use PrependToMapping method to replace Window MapTitle method #15041
  • Move some controls to use ModifyMapping #15058
  • Use AppendToMapping for Focus commands #15040
  • Fixed removing items from the shell causing a crash #15098
    area/shell 🐢
